weapon.name: Thunderous Halberd
weapon.description: A halberd infused with the power of thunder. Great for burst damage, and its length makes it a great weapon for a variety of ranges.

normals.name: Thrust
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack **5** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **33.3%** of ATK plus **200** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **30.5%** of ATK plus **183** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **63.8%** of ATK plus **383** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **88%** of ATK plus **528** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **155.1%** of ATK plus **931** and knock the target back a significant distance.

normals.name: Jumping Strike
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **4** times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **37%** of ATK plus **222**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **31.4%** of ATK plus **188**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **61.8%** of ATK plus **371**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **148.4%** of ATK plus **890**.

normals.name: Crashing Drive
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to **8%** of ATK plus **48** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **65.4%** of ATK plus **392** and knock the target down.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Spear Flurry
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target, dealing damage equal to **66.4%** of ATK plus **398**. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to **132.5%** of ATK plus **795** damage to a single target.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK plus **3420**.

dodge.name: Flying Kick
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to **97.2%** of ATK plus **583**, knock the enemies back significantly, and **stun** enemies for **1** second or **0.5** seconds to Wanderers.

dodge.name: Lunging Smash
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Slam the long spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to **71.4%** of ATK plus **428** and **strongly suspending** targets.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Moonchaser
skill.description: **Strongly suspend** targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to **171.9%** of ATK plus **1031**. Cooldown: **25** seconds.

discharge.name: Thunderclap
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**, then jump in the air and throw a thunderous spear that explodes on hitting the ground, dealing **400.5%** of ATK plus **2403** damage and **strongly paralyzing** targets for **1** second.

advancements.description: Increase shatter by **15%**. After shattering the target's shield, increase all teammates' ATK by **15%** for **30** seconds. This cannot be stacked.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **10%**.

After hitting a target with **Moonchaser**, reduce their ATK by **5%** and increase the user's ATK by **5%** for **15** seconds (effect can be stacked up to **3** times by hitting multiple targets). Effect is doubled to grievous targets.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **20%**.
Double stun duration from dodge skills.
Discharge skill deals more damage the further it travels, up to **100%** more damage.

matrice.name: Echo
matrice.description: A straight line of thought to completing the current goal.

set.set_2: Using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon grants **80**/**100/120** weapon charge.
